news.title: Under Trump, Uncle Sam is becoming an active investor at a scale not seen outside war or major crises
news.summary: The Trump administration has shown that it's willing to buy up stakes in publicly traded companies. Some say it's a level of intervention that some say is unprecedented.

news.title: 'He's showing up.' Things are getting better at Boeing under CEO Ortberg. Can he keep it going?
news.summary: Wall Street analysts expect the aircraft manufacturer to halve its second-quarter losses from a year ago when it reports earnings this week. The aircraft manufacturer is expected to report earnings on Tuesday.

news.title: How Trump and trade wars pushed Russia and Ukraine into the cold
news.summary: It's easy to forget Russian and Ukrainian soldiers continue to fight for every inch of frontline territory in Ukraine. The world feels like it has moved on.

news.title: What Europe's response to a no-deal with Trump could look like
news.summary: Uncertainty remains about if and when a trade agreement between the EU and U.S. could be struck. Uncertainty remains over when and if an agreement will be struck between the two countries.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these dividend stocks for regular income
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks. EOG Resources and Verizon, favored by Wall Street, are discussed.

news.title: ‘He cannot match my spending’: I’m 65 and have $7 million. My boyfriend is 73. Should he release equity from his home so we can enjoy retirement?
news.summary: “His financial circumstances present certain limitations for me,” he said. “He’s got a lot of money.”

news.title: Citi’s new Strata Elite credit card has a $595 annual fee. Here’s how its perks stack up against the competition.
news.summary: Rising annual fees and excessive statement credits have led to some fatigue in the premium credit-card market. Consumer demand persists, however, and credit card companies are trying to keep up.

news.title: Is now a good time to invest in the S&P 500? I’m 66, retired and have $200K to invest.
news.summary: The S&P 500 achieved its fifth consecutive record finish on Friday. It's its longest streak of record closing highs since July 10, 2024.

news.title: ‘Poof! His money could disappear’: My boyfriend is 75. His portfolio is down 4% this year. Do we fire his adviser?
news.summary: “His portfolio is still down from the April slump when everybody else’s accounts have gone up,” he says. “His portfolios are still down.”

news.title: He’s seen enough bull markets to be worried now. But this veteran investor still likes these stocks.
news.summary: RIA Advisor's Lance Roberts says Trump’s trade policies could trigger a correction soon. He says the market could be in for a shock if the U.S. fails to act on its trade policies.
